forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 42F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High near 40F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Snow showers late. Low near 30F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 24F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
